title: A Critical World Pivot | Guests: Dave Rubin & Dennis Prager | 7/31/20
description:
It doesn’t look good for Bill Clinton after he was allegedly seen with two young girls on Jeffrey Epstein’s island. An ESPN investigation found claims of player abuse at NBA academies in China. Dr. Simone Gold has been fired after her “White Coat Summit.” The Left has hammered Dr. Stella Immanuel for her odd religious beliefs, but have they ever gotten in the way of science? Sen. Mike Lee joins with the latest on Big Tech. 16-year AT&T employee Jonan Diaz claims he was fired over a private conversation and joins to explain. BlazeTV’s Dave Rubin is going off the grid for a month and joins before his final livestream, today on BlazeTV at 12:45 p.m. ET. And Dennis Prager discusses Big Tech censorship and rising anti-Semitism among the Left.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
